MappingMetricsFile R6 Class

Source: R/MappingMetricsFile.R
MappingMetricsFile.Rd

Contains methods for reading and displaying contents of the mapping_metrics.csv file output from DRAGEN. This file contains mapping and aligning metrics, like the metrics computed by the Samtools Flagstat command. These metrics are available on an aggregate level (over all input data), and on a per read group level. Unless explicitly stated, the metrics units are in reads (i.e., not in terms of pairs or alignments).

Super class

dracarys::File -> MappingMetricsFile

Methods

Method read()

Reads the mapping_metrics.csv file output from DRAGEN.

Usage

MappingMetricsFile$read()

Returns

tibble with the following columns: - category: summary or read group - Phenotype: e.g. tumor, normal - RG: read group - var: metric variable - var_abbrev: metric variable abbreviation - count: count of reads - pct: percentage of reads

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

MappingMetricsFile$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/wgs/SEQC-II.mapping_metrics.csv.gz", package = "dracarys")
mm <- MappingMetricsFile$new(x)
mm$read() # or read(mm)
#> # A tibble: 218 × 7
#>    category Phenotype RG    var                            var_a…¹   count   pct
#>    <chr>    <chr>     <chr> <chr>                          <chr>     <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 summary  tumor     TOTAL Total Reads per RG             Tot      2.2 e9 100  
#>  2 summary  tumor     TOTAL Number of duplicate marked re… Dup      4.43e8  20.2
#>  3 summary  tumor     TOTAL Number of duplicate marked an… Dup Rem NA       NA  
#>  4 summary  tumor     TOTAL Number of unique reads (excl.… Unique   1.76e9  79.8
#>  5 summary  tumor     TOTAL Reads with mate sequenced      Mated    2.2 e9 100  
#>  6 summary  tumor     TOTAL Reads without mate sequenced   noMated  0        0  
#>  7 summary  tumor     TOTAL QC-failed reads                Failed   0        0  
#>  8 summary  tumor     TOTAL Mapped reads                   Mapped   2.20e9  99.8
#>  9 summary  tumor     TOTAL Mapped reads adjusted for fil… Mapped…  2.20e9  99.8
#> 10 summary  tumor     TOTAL Mapped reads R1                R1map    1.10e9 100. 
#> # … with 208 more rows, and abbreviated variable name ¹​var_abbrev
